about_the_game:
The official demo for Astraverse, an Action RPG Beat' em-up for up to 4 players that's set in a sci-fi "phantasy" universe!

Create your own character and embark on a quest alone or with your friends on an adventure where your choices can affect the paths that you take!


Register yourself as a Seeker, an interplanetary sword-for-hire that works to assist and protect the people of the Ze're Star System.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3000 Series processor or equivalent
  • Graphics: GPU w/ 1GB Video RAM minimum
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
  • Additional Notes: Gamepad is recommended; Demo currently only runs at 1920x1080 resolution that may downscale to work on lower resolutions. Has only been tested on 1366×768.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3-6100U or equivalent
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 1050 or equivalent
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
  • Additional Notes: 1920x1080 display resolution and xinput gamepad controllers are recommended
